title: Glamorous Ski-In, Ski-Out Montana Mountain Retreat with 10,000-Square-Foot Spa
description: The natural beauty of Montana's Big Sky Country is front and centre at the area's first five-star resort, Montage Big Sky, a majestic ski-in/ski-out mountain retreat. During winter, the mountains are dusted with a thick blanket of snow, and in summer, the resort offers recreational activities including a private 18-hole golf course designed by Tom Weiskopf. The 10,000-square-foot Spa Montage promises a transcendent pampering experience, with alpine-inspired treatments and heated plunge pools. Onsite dining is a celebration of culinary excellence: savour pre-dinner cocktails with live piano music at Alpenglow, dine on traditional Northern Italian cuisine at Cortina and feast on wood-fired pizzas between bowling rounds at the fun-filled Beartooth Pub & Rec.
offer_address: 995 Settlement Trail, Big Sky, Montana 59716, United States

title: Historic Art Deco Bozeman Montana Stay with Music Hall, Rooftop Pool & Scenic Bars & Restaurants
description: Experience the best of Bozeman with a stay at the Kimpton Armory Hotel Bozeman, an IHG Hotel, housed in the Art Deco former National Guard Armory building. Taste hearty fare at onsite tavern Fielding's, sip whiskey at Tune Up, look out over the snowcapped Montana mountains at the rooftop Sky Shed bar, or take in a live music show at the onsite Armory Music Hall. Outdoor enthusiasts will savour the proximity to world-class hiking and skiing opportunities just moments away.
location_description: Kimpton Armory Hotel Bozeman, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 24 W. Mendenhall Street, Bozeman, Montana 59715, United States
